title: tirunAmam unadai
sahitya:
tirunAmam unadai nAn karudi varuvEn murugA


anupallavi

  tiruvEragam uraiyum kumara guruparak-kumaranE paramEshap-perumAnin pAvana kumAranE


caraNam    kAma krOdha lObhAdi tAmasa guNamellAm pAmaran ennai viTTup-parandODip-pOghavum
kSEmamAga janma sAphlayam uravum nI manam uvandiDa un nAmamE udavum ena
